Title: "Managing Azure Search Services with PowerShell: Best Practices and Tips"

205"})In some cases, such as when using managed identity to connect to a data source, youwill need to turn on system assigned managed identity. This is done by adding -IdentityType SystemAssigned to the command.Azure PowerShellTo create an S3HD service, a combination of -Sku and -HostingMode is used. Set -Sku toStandard3 and -HostingMode to HighDensity.Azure PowerShellPrivate Endpoints for Azure AI Search allow a client on a virtual network to securelyaccess data in a search index over a Private Link. The private endpoint uses an IP addressfrom the virtual network address space for your search service. Network traffic between New-AzSearchService -ResourceGroupName <resource-group-name> `                      -Name <search-service-name> `                      -Sku Standard `                      -Location "West US" `                      -PartitionCount 3 -ReplicaCount 3 `                      -HostingMode Default `                      -IPRuleList $ipRulesCreate a service with a system assigned managed identityNew-AzSearchService -ResourceGroupName <resource-group-name> `                      -Name <search-service-name> `                      -Sku Standard `                      -Location "West US" `
